hero.1.0.0: Initial release with logos, title, subtitle, CTA buttons, and tech logos footer
hero.1.1.0: Added card wrapper, text logo support, improved light/dark mode compatibility
hero.2.0.0: BREAKING: Changed button props from string labels to HeroButton objects with optional label and icon
hero.2.0.1: Image logos now display without bordered container, text logos remain in bordered square
hero.2.1.0: Added urlLight prop for dark mode logo variant support
hero.2.1.1: Reduced logo image height for better visual balance
hero.2.1.2: Removed default content data - component only renders explicitly provided data
hero.2.1.3: Replaced key={index} with stable content-based keys for tech logos
hero.2.2.0: Added demo data defaults - component renders demo content when no data prop is provided
hero.2.2.1: Fixed import type for verbatimModuleSyntax compatibility

manifest-types.1.0.0: Initial shared type definitions for Manifest UI components
manifest-types.1.0.1: Added missing OrderItem export for payment components
